civilopediaText.text: Click on a unit → Click on a destination → Click the arrow popup.

name: Tutorial Task: [Move unit]
uniques: Only available <if tutorials are enabled> <when number of [Units] is more than [0]>
Unavailable <if tutorial [Move unit] is completed>

civilopediaText.text: Select the Settler → Click on 'Found city'.

uniques: Only available <if tutorials are enabled> <when number of [[Settler] Units] is more than [0]>
Unavailable <if tutorial [Found city] is completed>

name: Tutorial Task: [Enter city screen]
uniques: Only available <if tutorials are enabled> <when number of [Cities] is more than [0]>
Unavailable <if tutorial [Enter city screen] is completed>

civilopediaText.text: Click on the tech button → Select technology → Click 'Research' (bottom right).

name: Tutorial Task: [Pick technology]
uniques: Only available <if tutorials are enabled> <if tutorial [Found city] is completed>
Unavailable <if tutorial [Pick technology] is completed>

civilopediaText.text: Enter city screen → Click on a unit or building → Click 'add to queue'.

name: Tutorial Task: [Pick construction]
uniques: Only available <if tutorials are enabled> <when number of [Cities] is more than [0]>
Unavailable <if tutorial [Pick construction] is completed>

civilopediaText.text: Cycle through units with 'Next unit' → Click 'Next turn'.

uniques: Only available <if tutorials are enabled> <when number of [turns] is less than [3]>
Unavailable <if tutorial [Pass a turn] is completed>

name: Tutorial Task: [Reassign worked tiles]
uniques: Only available <if tutorials are enabled> <when number of [Cities] is more than [0]>
Unavailable <if tutorial [Reassign worked tiles] is completed>
Mark tutorial [Meet another civilization] complete

civilopediaText.text: Explore the map until you encounter another civilization!

uniques: Only available <if tutorials are enabled> <when number of [turns] is more than [1]>
Unavailable <if tutorial [Meet another civilization] is completed>

name: Tutorial Task: [Open the options table]
uniques: Only available <if tutorials are enabled>
Unavailable <if tutorial [Open the options table] is completed>

civilopediaText.text: Construct a Worker unit → Move it to a Plains or Grassland tile → Click 'Construct improvement' → Choose the farm → Leave the worker there until it's finished.

uniques: Only available <if tutorials are enabled> <when number of [Cities] is more than [0]>
Unavailable <if tutorial [Construct an improvement] is completed>

Unavailable <if tutorial [Create a trade route] is completed>

civilopediaText.text: Bring an enemy city down to low health → Enter the city with a melee unit.

name: Tutorial Task: [Conquer a city]
uniques: Only available <if tutorials are enabled> <when at war>
Unavailable <if tutorial [Conquer a city] is completed>
